text: The children are on the veranda outside of the party. Frau Smmidt & Frau Franz enter. Gretle bows to them
No, a lady curtsies. (Gretel curtsies) ThatвЂ™s right. You must do that to all of the guests.
All of them. WonвЂ™t my knees get tired?
ThatвЂ™s the price of being a lady.
Everyone looks so beautiful. I guess we look beautiful too!  "The Sound of Musc" 34.
I think they look ugly.
You just say that because youвЂ™re scared.
Silly, only grown-up men are scared of women.
We've never had a party in the house before, this is so exciting.
Oh yes, there used to be lots of parties here.
Freidrick & I used to sneak out and watch everyone from the top of the stairs.
I remember the music. Once father brought a Gypsy orchestra all the way from Budapest!
Yes, they wore red coats! Lesil & Freisel begin to dance with a pretend partner
Who are you dancing with?
Me. Freidrick taps Liesl on the shoulder & they begin to dance.
Yuck. Maria enters.
Well, why didnвЂ™t you children tell me you could dance?
We were afraid you'd make us dance together. The Von Trapp Family Dancers! The all laugh.  "The Sound of Musc" 35.
May I have this dance young man?
Since its you Fraulein Maria. They begin to dance as the children look on. The captain enters. He walks over to Maria & Kurt.
May I cut in.
(surprised) Oh dear. (smiles) yes. The dance. The baroness appears. Maria looks into his eyes and suddenly stops. MARIA (cont'd) I...I seem to have forgotten the rest.
(clearing her throat) There you are darling. Maria and the captain quickly break apart.
Good evening Baroness. (she curtseys) If you'll excuse me. Come along children. Maria exits with the children.
Good night Father, Baroness.
I really must speak to the cook about the wienerschnitzel. ItвЂ™s entirely too delicious for my figure...
I'm sorry, Baroness, ...IвЂ™ve.

DonвЂ™t. DonвЂ™t say another word. You see, uh, there are other things IвЂ™ve been thinking of. While planning this party over the past few weeks...IвЂ™ve seen the way you look at Maria. I know youвЂ™ve grown fond of her. (MORE)

"The Sound of Musc" 36. BARONESS (cont'd) (pause) Now if youвЂ™1ll excuse me, IвЂ™m going to go back inside and pack my little things and go back to Vienna where I belong. Somewhere out there is a young lady who I think...will never be a nun. The Baroness hugs the captina and exits. Frau Schmitt & Frau Franz enter with Maxine with another telegram.
Captain, another telegram has arrived.
I really think the children should be in the festival. They are so very talented (pause) is everything okay? The captain opens the telegram and reads it.
They've offered me a commission in their Navy. I've been requested to report tomorrow morning.
I knew this day would come but so soon?
I have to find Maria.
The children sit around as Maria and the Captain hold hands. They are in their play clothes holding suitcases.
Children, the captain and I have decided to leave Austria. The Captain and maria are holding hands
Why are you holding hands father?
Did you marry Maria The Captain looks at Marie and smiles.  "The Sound of Musc" 37.
Not yet. All of the children run to Maria and hug her.
Our new mother.
Well not yet. But we have to hurry. Come along now children. We have to be quiet.
Because itвЂ™s night time?
Something like that.
I will miss you all. I wish you could be singing in my festival tonight.
Perhaps another time. They shake hands. Fraulein Schmitt enters with two soldiers. They are Rolf and Herr Zeller.
I tried to stop them.
That's okay Fraulein Schmitt.
Going somewhere Captain.
WE were just going for a walk.
Convenient, you are supposed to report for duty for the German Navy tomorrow.
Rolf! What are you doing. Rolf stares straight ahead ignoring her. Maria hugs her close as she silently cries.  "The Sound of Musc" 38.
Was I. I donвЂ™t recall receiving a telegram about that.
You've received several and IвЂ™m here to take you directly myself.
Well, thatвЂ™s impossible gentlemen.
Why is that?
The family Von Trapp is singing in the Salsberg festival this evening. ItвЂ™s all arrange.
I only hope we arenвЂ™t too late. We should really get going.
Once again, how convenient.
LetвЂ™s go captain. The general is waiting.

STOP! You will sing, you will all sing. But that is only because I want it to be. I want the people of Salzburg to see that nothing has changed. I shall escort you myself. Carry on. They all exit. SCENE 9 EXT. SALZBURG TOWN CENTER. Lights up on Maxine introduces the next Salzberg contestant. There are various contestants that go on before the Von Trapp family. There are puppets, singers, & dancers.
May I present the Salzburg Puppets! вЂњLONGELY GOATHEARD SONGвЂќ BEGINS  "The Sound of Musc" 39.

High on a hill was a lonely goatherd Layee odl, layee odl layee-oo Loud was the voice of the lonely goatherd Layee odl, layee odl-oo Folks in a town that was quite remote heard Layee odl, layee odl layee-oo Lusty and clear from the goatherd's throat heard Layee odl, layee odl-oo Oho layee odllee-oo Oho layee odl ay! Oho layee odllee-oo Hododlleeoay! Maxine finally announces the Von Trapp Family.
Thank you. May I introduce the Family Von Trapp.

head_text.subj: THERE'S A SAD SORT OF CLANGING FROM THE CLOCK
IN THE HALL AND THE BELLS IN THE STEEPLE TOO
AND UP IN THE NURSERY AN ABSURD LITTLE BIRD
REGRETFULLY THEY TELL US CUCKOO, CUCKOO
BUT FIRMLY THEY COMPEL US CUCKOO, CUCKOO
TO SAY GOODBYE . . .TO YOU. SO LONG, FAREWELL,
I HATE TO GO AND LEAVE THIS PRETTY SIGHT
SO LONG, FAREWELL, AUF WIEDERSEHEN, ADIEU
ADIEU, ADIEU, TO YIEU AND YIEU AND YIEU
SO LONG, FAREWELL, AU REVOIR, AUF WIEDERSEHEN
I'D LIKE TO STAY AND TASTE MY FIRST

text: "The Sound of Musc" 40.

head_text.subj: SO LONG, FAREWELL, AUF WIEDERSEHEN, GOODBYE

text: I LEAVE AND HEAVE A SIGH AND SAY GOODBYE -вЂ”-

head_text.subj: I'M GLAD TO GO, I CANNOT TELL A LIE
I FLIT, I FLOAT, I FLEETLY FLEE, I FLY
THE SUN HAS GONE TO BED AND SO MUST I
SO LONG, FAREWELL, AUF WIEDERSEHEN, GOODBYE

text: Thank you everyone. That concludes our show. Please sit while the judges give us the winner of the show. Enter a girl with an envelope. MAXINE (cont'd) In second place, the Salzburg pupets! Enter the puppets bowing continuously. They exit. MAXINE (contвЂ™d) This years Salzburg festival winners are...The Family Von Trapp. (long pause) The Von Trapp Family singers....(long pause). The Family Von Trapp. A soldier runs out
TheyвЂ™re gone! Everyone gasps. The curtain clothes. The Von Trapp family has left Salzburg forever.
